entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
